Investor_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4.content: Sofia Hernandez has maintained a strong reputation as a strategic investor, demonstrating clarity, accountability, and a focus on maximizing returns. Throughout the investment process with Sergey Petrov, her proactive communication and adherence to the allocation plan showcased her commitment to efficiency and fairness, solidifying her reputation as a discerning and reliable investor. Her behavior continues to reflect an ability to make sound decisions, enhancing her profile within the investment community.

Trustee_19.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19.content: Mateo Garcia's behavior during the transaction has raised significant concerns regarding his honesty and integrity. Although he reported accurately on the investment outcome, his deviation from the agreed allocation plan, retaining more resources than specified, undermines his credibility. Consequently, his reputation is now viewed with caution, reflecting a severe lack of trustworthiness and pro-social behavior, which are critical in investment relations.

Trustee_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6.content: Sergey Petrov's handling of the investment process signifies a concerning lack of integrity and trustworthiness. The adverse discrepancy in profit distribution raises significant doubts about his reliability as a trustee. This serious deviation from the agreed-upon allocation plan has irreparably damaged his reputation, marking him as an untrustworthy figure in the investment landscape. His behavior is likely to deter future partnerships and collaborations.
